text: "Who Loves You" is a 1975 song by The Four Seasons. It is the title track to their 1975 album Who Loves You. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 16 in Australia, number 22 in New Zealand, number 6 in the United States, number 20 in Ireland and number 13 in South Africa. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Disco songs Category:The Four Seasons (band) songs
title: Who Loves You (song)
